General.Name: Indo Thai Securities Limited
General.Description: Indo Thai Securities Limited engages in the stock and share broking, depository participants, real estate, and other related ancillary businesses in India. The company operates through Broking, Commission & Related Activities; Real Estate Business; and Manufacturing Activities segments. It trades in equities and derivatives, commodities derivatives, and currency derivatives; and offers depository, algo trading, portfolio management, and wealth management services. The company also provides initial public offerings; life, health, motor/vehicle, fire, marine, travel, and indemnity insurance products; and mutual funds, non-convertible debentures, bonds, and fixed deposits, as well as co-working spaces. In addition, it operates a trading platform, and mobile and desktop applications under the Winstock name; offers online future trading services; and deals in the business of real estate and consultancy. Further, the company purchases and sells properties; develops and rents lands; and manufactures and sells environmental technologies. It serves corporate clients, high net worth individuals, and retail investors. Indo Thai Securities Limited was incorporated in 1995 and is headquartered in Indore, India.
